DMRTokenSale.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMRTokenSale.sol#86-104) uses timestamp for comparisons

	- require(bool)(startDate > 0 && now.sub(startDate) <= 604800) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMRTokenSale.sol#87)
	- now.sub(startDate) <= 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMRTokenSale.sol#92)
	- now.sub(startDate) > 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMRTokenSale.sol#94)
